common.title: Frak configuration
common.loadingTimeout: The loading has expired. Please try again.
common.allSet: Frak application is correctly set up

step1.title: Welcome to Frak!
step1.description: Ready to explore exciting features and build an effective loyalty program for your business?

step2.title: Application pixel
step2.description: In order to track your loyalty program, we need to implement an application pixel.

step3.title: Webhook
step3.description: Next, we need to set up a webhook to pass information about the orders.

step4.title: Setup Frak embedded app within your theme
step4.description: Frak application needs to be enabled in your theme.
step4.link: Configure Frak embedded application in your theme
step4.todo: Please activate the app using the switch as shown below

step5.title: Add the share or wallet button in your theme
step5.description: A share or wallet button should be added
step5.link: Add the sharing button to your product page
step5.noProduct: You need to add a product to your store to add the sharing button
step5.activated: Share button is on your product page
step5.notActivated: Share button is not in your product page
step5.todo: Please add the button as shown below
step5.collapsibleButtonShareTitle: How to add the share button to your product page
step5.collapsibleButtonWalletTitle: How to add the wallet button
step5.todoWalletButton: Please activate the button as shown below
step5.walletButtonConnected: Wallet button is active on your store

step6.title: Well done!
step6.description: You have completed the Frak setup!

pixel.title: Application pixel
pixel.connected: Your pixel is connected to your store.
pixel.notConnected: Your pixel is not connected to your store.
pixel.needConnection: You need to connect your pixel to your store to track your customers purchases.

webhook.title: Webhook
webhook.connected: Your webhook is connected to your store.
webhook.notConnected: Your webhook is not connected to your store.
webhook.needConnection: You need to connect your webhook to your store to track your customers purchases.

theme.title: Theme
theme.link: Configuring Frak application in your theme

button.title: Share button
button.connected: Frak button is on your product page
button.notConnected: Frak button is not in your product page
button.link: Configure button in your product page

walletButton.title: Wallet button
walletButton.link: Configure wallet button in theme editor

gated.start: Create a Frak wallet to start using the app.

noWallet.title: Wallet Connection Required
noWallet.message: Please connect your wallet in the settings page to continue setup.

connectionStatus.title: Connection Status
connectionStatus.checking: We're checking if your shop is connected to the Frak ecosystem.
connectionStatus.connected: Your shop is successfully connected to the Frak ecosystem.
connectionStatus.notConnected: Your shop is not yet connected to the Frak ecosystem. Follow the instructions below to complete setup.

setupInstructions.title: Set up your Frak integration
setupInstructions.description: Click the button below to register your shop in the Frak ecosystem

modal.title: Register your shop
modal.button: Register your shop in the Frak ecosystem

connectedShop.title: Your Shop on Frak
connectedShop.description: Your shop is successfully connected to the Frak ecosystem and ready to use all features.

campaign.title: Campaigns
campaign.description: The campaigns are the core parts of your monetization strategy with Frak. It will define what rewards will be distributed to end users.
campaign.name: Name
campaign.weeklyBudgetInfo: This is the max amount of money that will be distributed to end users per week.
campaign.rawCACInfo: This is the raw amount that will be distributed to referrer and referee.
campaign.ratioHelp: Adjust the split between referrer and referee (max 90-10%)

bank.title: Banks
bank.description: The banks are the source of cash that will be used to distribute rewards to end users.

purchase.title: Purchase
purchase.description: By making a Purchase you will add funds to the bank. The fund will be be used to distribute rewards to end users.
